member.name: T:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool
member.summary: the class for the LineFindTool
member.remarks: The LineFindTool encapsulates all of the classes required to perform a line finding analysis.

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.Finalize
member.summary: 终结器

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.Dispose
member.summary: 释放资源

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.AddMask(VisionDesigner.CMvdShape)
member.summary: Add a mask region to excluded
member.remarks: Adds a new uninterested region in the InputImage to the end of mask list. MasksNum will be increased by one.Only IMvdPolygon type supported in current version. Support up to 8 polygons at the same time.
member.param: The mask region on the input image

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.ClearMasks
member.summary: Removes all masks already added.

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.RemoveMaskAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the mask at the given index from the mask list.
member.remarks: Masks with higher indices are shifted to the next lower index, and NumPoints is decreased by one.
member.param: index of the target mask shape according to the order of addition

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.GetNumOfMasks
member.summary: Gets the number of masks already added.

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.GetRunParam(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Get the run parameters for this LineFind tool.

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.SetRunParam(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the run parameters for this LineFind tool.

member.summary: Save the configuration information of this LineFind tool
member.param: the file buffer with parameters information to save
actual length of the buffer content

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.LoadConfiguration(System.Byte[],System.UInt32)
member.summary: Load the configuration information of this LineFind tool
member.param: the file buffer with parameters information to load

member.name: M:VisionDesigner.LineFind.CLineFindTool.Run
member.summary: Runs the tool using the current parameter settings.

member.summary: input image to process

member.summary: ROI region on the input image

member.summary: 处理区域图
member.remarks: 通常由ROI+Masks计算所得的处理区域标识；若非全区ROI，需配合调用SetROI接口再传入ROI位置
